info: 初遇新友邻-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content:
Hi there!
So... what's your name?
info: 初遇新友邻-热贝尔_主流程文本2
初遇新友邻-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content: So there you are! You had me looking everywhere for you, you precious little stone...
info: 初遇新友邻-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content: ...Sorry, I got distracted by this precious little piece of ore and forgot to greet you.
info: 初遇新友邻-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content:
You found this ore deposit before me.
There's something about you, bhan!
As for this...
info: 初遇新友邻-热贝尔_主流程文本2
初遇新友邻-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content:
I'm getting excited!
Let's meet up ahead!
Bhan-bhan—
info: 初遇新友邻-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content:
Hi, I'm Rebella, from...
Hmm, that's not important.
info: 初遇新友邻-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content:
This is my first time seeing ore that vibrates,
You're not a honey bee,
So why are you buzzing around?
info: 初遇新友邻-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content:
...Oh well, it's not like it would answer me anyway.
Call it a hunch, but I have a feeling
there are even bigger surprises waiting for me up ahead—
info: 初遇新友邻-热贝尔_主流程文本2
